transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello ha ji boliye namaskar sir

Customer: ha namaskar namaskar bataiye hello

Executive: ha adab ji boliye boliye

Customer: ji sir main sane baat kar raha hun sir kal aapne call kiya tha na mujhe

Customer: ha ha evening mein ha sir kiya tha mujhe sab chiz ka to sir main aapki call na apne team member ke sath karwa raha hun theek hai

Executive: theek hai hello ha dekha aapne wo ji bank ka letter aapne dekha tha nahi dekha tha

Customer: nahi nahi sir aapne jo bheja tha wo to dekha tha maine

Executive: theek lekin main aapko jo call hai na meri jo buyer supply contact team hai jo last wo karegi jo meri team hai sir

to meri team hai india mart ki jo team hai jo aapka problem sambhal deti hai buyer supply contact wala wo karwayegi sir to aapka yahi wala chiz na unko bhi dunga ki unka 25 lakh ka aapka wo jo loan hai final ho gaya bas ye chiz dikha karke main aapka ek call arrange karwa de raha hun

Customer: ha wo unko ek main bata tha na ek kya naam hai unka koi yadav ji hai unka phone aaya tha kal bhi aaya tha

Executive: sir apna baat wahi ha ji sir maine hi call arrange karwaya tha aapke liye waha pe mujhe aaj update aa raha hai na ki aap busy the shayad aapne call nahi uthaya

Customer: krishna krishna yadav ji se baat hui thi hamari aur ha krishna yadav ji ko unko mail kar diya unko kal hum logo ne mail karwa diya ye chiz

Executive: call pe rahiye sir main krishna yadav ko call karta hun ek minute ha krishna ji se puchiye ek bar unko aap aap se pehle dono aadmi ko ek hi sath mail karwaya gaya tha unko bhi aur aapko bhi ye chize unko bhi kar di gayi hai ruk jaiye sir call pe rahiye

Customer: dekhiye hum log ki taraf se sane ji bilkul neat and clean chize hoti hai theek hai na

Executive: sir sir mujhe na hame apne har ek buyer pe sir bharosa hai theek hai sir but hum log dekhiye compliance ke andar hi na sab kuch kar rahe hain to aisa nahi ki hum aapke upar koi shak ya aapko ya kisi iske andar dal de hum is hamara problem bas ye hai na ki hame dono side ka baat sun kar ke ek proof ke sath aage badh sakte hain sir isliye delay ho gaya ki aap jo bata rahe the aur jo client bata raha tha un sab chizo mein thoda sa wo match making nahi ho pa raha tha isliye second delay hua aapka problem

Executive: ek minute sir main krishna ko call laga raha hun

Executive: hello ha ji krishna main sane bol raha hun business manager kalyani finance

Executive: kal ke date pe ek case hai na aapke pass kalyani finance ji likho aap ji unhone aapko sir wahi hai to baat ho gayi hai wo bolna tha ki loan ka service call bhi date hai wo to final ka baat se baat ho gayi thi unse detail confirm kar liya tha baat matching call aaya tha inka to matlab aapka buyer se baat ho gaya buyer satisfied hai na unka loan sanction ho gaya hai buyer se meri baat nahi hui supplier ho gayi unko detail dete rahe the main kaha dekho chize satisfy jo bata raha hai wo to main kaha aap to wo bol rahe the unhe bhi document wagera mangwa ek bar to main phone karaya tha theek hai to already nahi matlab wo bol raha tha nahi itne de do to aaj abhi main unse phone kar raha hun pehle to main buyer se baat karta hun agar resolve ho jata to theek hai agar nahi manta to please please please aap usko na karwa client ke side se jo kam tha mere client ke side se jo kam tha ki loan unko karwana tha wo unko mil gaya wo to pura proof bhi de raha hai is chiz ko 25 lakh ka business loan hai matlab usme 25000 ke liye wo roj bhi to utna to shayad fees jata hoga matlab jo bhi hai aap usko dekh ke clear karwaiye theek hai krishna wo mail kar diya gaya hai inko bol dijiye mail kar diya gaya hai wo check kar le mail bol diya bol diya unhone dekh liya hai aap tension mat karo mera ek alag se na mera ek alag se mail thread chal raha hai pure internal unko wo hierarchy ko lekar ke main waha pe bhi dal raha hun sari chize jo bhi update aa rahi hai aapke side se main us chiz ko bhi update kar dunga don't worry about it theek hai ha nahi to unko bhi humne update kar diya tha ye chize mail kar di gayi thi hum log ke pass jo list aa raha hai na bank se wo humne de diya tha ye bank ka aur msme ki taraf se hi aaya hua letter hai ab isme koi hum apne ghar se to bana nahi rahe hain na ha ha ha ha aap agar usme kon sa branch hai usme involve to aap ye hai to ifsc code hai branch ka aap branch manager se bhi baat kar sakte hain ki is tarah ki file aapke pass gayi hai nahi gayi hai contact kar sakte hain branch se applicant agar jhoot bol raha hai to direct branch ye letter to jo government officials ne diya hai wo jhoot nahi bolega na nahi sir bilkul nahi jhoot bolega document hai to document hai ek chiz wahi main dekh raha hun iska karwa de raha hun aap is chiz se rahiye theek hai maine inko bheja hai unhone ek bar aise bola hai ki ha meri to baat ho gayi thi kal aap mujhe batai the ki aap se baat ho gayi hai kal ke date pe samajh samajh gaya tha wo buyer ko call kiya to buyer ne call nahi uthaya tha jo mujhe case ke upar complaint dala hai theek hai usne call nahi uthaya bola ki aadhe ghante mein dobara se usse baat karega baat karke mana lega agar in case fir bhi agar wo complaint jo kiya hai wo nahi man raha hai to ek bar conference call karwayenge aapke sath thoda sa call pe sir available rahiye ga hai na hmm theek hai theek hai sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Loan of 25 lakhs not yet sanctioned.

- Yadav ji's call regarding the loan.



Resolution:

- Executive connected with the concerned team.

- Executive assured the customer of resolution.

- Executive confirmed the loan has been sanctioned.



Next Steps: 

- Conference call will be arranged if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- loan, sanction, kalyani finance, business
